name: Disarray (Trop's Workshop)
description:
Each player starts with some cups with a unique color in them but the outsides are all the same. The game starts with the cups being flipped over. Each turn a player moves one cup. The first person to get all their cups across the board wins. Don't get confused what cups are yours. Nothing is worse then getting a cup across the board and flipping it over to seeing it isn't your cup.

Based on the board game Chaos.
